Entertainments Contest
Macleans College, Bucklands Beach, Auckland, New Zealand Thanks for any more Details about diff. Editions of this Contest and its Sections!
[ (M) March Points, (S) Solo, Light Music (LM) & Public Appeal (PA) see Bands Detail ]
Sacred Item – Skinner Shield: 1st: Waitakere Auckland Brass, 2nd: Dalewool Auckland Brass, 3rd: Leopard Coachlines Canterbury Brass Major Work – Jim Carson Memorial Cup: 1st: Leopard Coachlines Canterbury Brass, 2nd: Waitakere Auckland Brass and Dalewool Auckland Brass March – International Military Music Society Trophy: 1st: Waitakere Auckland Brass, 2nd: Dalewool Auckland Brass, 3rd: Leopard Coachlines Canterbury Brass Solo - Greg Moverley Memorial Trophy: Winner: Andrew Large of Waitakere Auckland Brass
Light Music – The Open Challenge Cup: 1st: Dalewool Auckland Brass, 2nd: Waitakere Auckland Brass, 3rd: Leopard Coachlines Canterbury Brass Public Appeal – The Besson Trophy: 1st: Papakura City Brass and Dalewool Auckland Brass, 2nd: Waitakere Auckland Brass and Leopard Coachlines Canterbury Brass Aggregate – Kennerley Memorial: 1st: Waitakere Auckland Brass, 2nd: Dalewool Auckland Brass, 3rd: Leopard Coachlines Canterbury Brass
Dec. 8, 2016, 7:22 p.m. March 29, 2017, 10:56 a.m.
1 Waitakere Auckland Brass Howard Taylor
2 City of Sails Auckland Brass Steve Miles
3 Canterbury Brass Dwayne Bloomfield
4 Papakura City Brass Adrian Raven
5 Auckland City Brass Mark Close
